alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 12 at 2:44PM MST until August 12 at 3:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON NEAR KIRKLAND IN YAVAPAI COUNTY... At 242 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated that heavy rain had ended over the warning area, near Kirkland. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain fell earlier this afternoon. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Kirkland. This includes the following highways... State Route 89 between mile markers 287 and 291. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Copper Basin Wash, Kirkland Creek, Sheppard Wash, Finch Wash and Skull Valley Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life.
